actions.action: Update `ExecuteAction` to handle the `"navigate"` action type and extract the `"url"` field from the JSON payload.

gemini_cli_task.execution_directive: This task allows the agent to take the first step toward a mission without human guidance. It bridges the gap between having a goal and finding the data.
